model

Class SongSelector

  • Object
    • SongSelector

  • public class SongSelector
extends Object
    This class will keep track of all the songs that can be played. It will also determine if a given song can be played and add it to the mp3 player to play. A thread is used so that any songs in the queue will automatically be played.
    Author:
    David Wang Modified: Alexis Tinoco

      boolean addToQueue(String name, Account user, boolean isJUnitTest)
      This method will only add to Queue if the user is allowed to add the given song to queue And if the song has not been played 3 times today
      void closeAll()
      This method will close all the song threads

      • addToQueue

        public boolean addToQueue(String name,
                          Account user,
                          boolean isJUnitTest)
        This method will only add to Queue if the user is allowed to add the given song to queue And if the song has not been played 3 times today
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the song
        user - the user that asked for the song to be played
        isJUnitTest - determines if current run is a j unit test
        Returns:
        true if able to add to queue, false if not
